name: Foul Play
description: You turn a creature's own power against it. Make a melee attack roll using your MOVE power. On a hit, the target takes an amount of dark damage equal to 2d8 + the target's level.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
